title: Moving maps: Meet the team who helps keep the Tour de France vehicles, riders, and motorcycles on course
content:
NTT provides more than just the live race tracking data, it tracks the whole race from the publicity caravan to the in-race vehicles. They can even forecast the weather.

Read the full article at Moving maps: Meet the team who helps keep the Tour de France vehicles, riders, and motorcycles on course on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
